channel.title: Need Help building a device
channel.description: Im trying make A teleporting Device teleport u 5 placesa if u stand on middle of it can someone make it for me or give clue? Device object id = 4868 i want if u in the right place WILL BE CHOOSE where u wana teleport .. like npc talk dialogue Like place 1 place 2 place 3 ... and if your not in right place says in npcs chat stand in right place Thank You if help me!@
